titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the Law Enforcement Torch Run for the Special Olympics through the Capitol Grounds.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 621.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
House Committee on Public Works and Transportation Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/12/1988--Introduced. Permits the Law Enforcement Torch Run for the Special Olympics to be run through the Capitol Grounds.
